short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive emails to your disposable email address directly in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the TemporaryMail.com extension you will be able to select a custom temporary email address and instantly get access to its inbox in your browser.

You will be able to easily paste your temporary email address into text fields and when you receive an incoming email you will see a notification.

Notice: please keep in mind that this extension respects your privacy and therefore it only requests to read data from TemporaryMail.com and NOT from all websites.  If you are doubtful, then we encourage you to check the source code of this extension to verify it for yourself (it's very small so you can use AI if you are not a programmer).
